source_document.title: British Western Desert Air Force, 26 May 1942

aggregate_strength.note: Aggregate strength from Wikipedia Battle of Gazala (22 June 1942). Squadron count and organization from Nafziger Collection (26 May 1942).

sources: Wikipedia - Battle of Gazala article (22 June 1942 aggregate strength)
metadata.extraction_method: Hybrid: Wikipedia aggregate + Nafziger organization + standard RAF establishments
metadata.notes: Organizational structure with 21 squadrons from Nafziger Collection. Aggregate strength (463 operational aircraft, 420 in Middle East theater) from Wikipedia Battle of Gazala. Squadron-level strength estimated using RAF standard establishment of 16 aircraft per squadron. Data sources are 3-4 weeks apart (Nafziger: 26 May, Wikipedia: 22 June 1942). Detailed squadron-level data available in UK National Archives AIR 27 Operations Record Books (requires subscription).
metadata.future_enhancement: AIR 27 ORBs for exact squadron strengths
